title: Amazon plans to cut 9,000 corporate and tech workers
description: The layoffs are expected to happen by the end of April

title: Amazon to cut 9,000 jobs in second round of layoffs
description: Chief executive officer Andy Jassy announced the cuts internally Monday, saying they would occur in the coming weeks and primarily affect Amazon Web Services, human resources, advertising and the Twitch livestreaming service groups
